column4: HI, question about CD & DVD versions of Final release H Heron 8.04 - Installed both on two test boxes - and I can't see any difference between the two installs. Does the DVD version install more packages for synaptics locally or what is the biggest difference between them?
the DVD has more packages on it, so that you don't need to download them later on
Ah - Thought that might be the case. It takes longer on the install of DVD version - but is ok to spend less time on net too.
